pages.text: Tallow is rendered fat from the dead. While it sees use in some brews and rituals, it is most commonly used in Flying Ointment and Candles.
Boiled fat of the dead. Used for candles and more.
Candles can come in all 16 different colors!

A fairly grotesque mixture of tallow of the dead along with many toxic and aromatic plants with known psychoactive properties, brooms can be anointed with this mixture in order to imbue it with magic to allow it to fly.
